languages.text: Мостик: Приказ Лорд-капитана — готовиться к маневрам. Щиты на максимум, двигатели на максимум, огонь по противнику — только по команде!.. Стойте, что это?

traits.locale_text: Мостик: Приказ Лорд-капитана — готовится к маневрам. Щиты на максимум, двигатели на максимум, огонь по противнику — только по команде!.. Стойте, что это?

languages.text: Bridge: Lord Captain's orders — prepare for manoeuvring. Shields to max, engines to max, fire on the enemy on my mark only! Wait... What is that?
languages.original_text: Мостик: Приказ Лорд-капитана — готовиться к маневрам. Щиты на максимум, двигатели на максимум, огонь по противнику — только по команде!.. Стойте, что это?

traits.locale_text: Bridge: Lord Captain's orders — prepare for maneuvering. Shields to max, engines to max, fire on the enemy on my mark only! Wait... What is that?
Bridge: Lord Captain's orders — prepare for maneuvering. Shields to max, engines to max, fire on the enemy on my mark only! Wait... What is that?
Bridge: Lord Captain's orders — prepare for manoeuvring. Shields to max, engines to max, fire on the enemy on my mark only! Wait... What is that?
Bridge: Lord Captain's orders — prepare for manoeuvring. Shields to max, engines to max, fire on the enemy on my mark only! Wait... What is that?
Bridge: Lord Captain's orders — prepare for manoeuvring. Shields to max, engines to max, fire on the enemy on my mark only! Wait... What is that?

languages.text: Puente: Órdenes de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}: listos para maniobrar. Escudos al máximo, motores listos, ¡esperen a mi señal para disparar al enemigo! Un momento... ¿Qué es eso?
languages.original_text: Bridge: Lord Captain's orders — prepare for manoeuvring. Shields to max, engines to max, fire on the enemy on my mark only! Wait... What is that?

traits.locale_text: Puente: Órdenes de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}: listos para maniobrar. Escudos al máximo, motores listos, ¡esperen a mi señal para disparar al enemigo! Un momento... ¿Qué es eso?

languages.text: 舰桥：舰长大人下令，准备机动。护盾功率全开，引擎功率全开，只朝我标记的敌方单位开火！等等……那是什么？
languages.original_text: Bridge: Lord Captain's orders — prepare for manoeuvring. Shields to max, engines to max, fire on the enemy on my mark only! Wait... What is that?

traits.locale_text: 舰桥：舰长大人下令，准备机动。护盾功率全开，引擎功率全开，只朝我标记的敌方单位开火！等等……那是什么？

languages.text: ブリッジ：ロード・キャプテンより指令だ…操縦用意。シールド最大、エンジン最大、攻撃は合図とともに行え！待て…あれは何だ？
languages.original_text: Bridge: Lord Captain's orders — prepare for manoeuvring. Shields to max, engines to max, fire on the enemy on my mark only! Wait... What is that?

traits.locale_text: ブリッジ：ロード・キャプテンより指令だ…操縦用意。シールド最大、エンジン最大、攻撃は合図とともに行え！待て…あれは何だ？

languages.text: Brücke: Befehl vom Lord Captain – Manöver vorbereiten! Schilde und Triebwerke maximal, Feuer auf den Feind nur auf mein Signal! Moment ... was ist das?
languages.original_text: Bridge: Lord Captain's orders — prepare for manoeuvring. Shields to max, engines to max, fire on the enemy on my mark only! Wait... What is that?

traits.locale_text: Brücke: Befehl vom Lord Captain – Manöver vorbereiten! Schilde und Triebwerke maximal, Feuer auf den Feind nur auf mein Signal! Moment ... was ist das?

languages.text: Passerelle : Sur ordre {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, préparez-vous à la manœuvre. Boucliers au maximum, moteurs à plein régime, parés à tirer sur l'ennemi à mon signal ! Attendez... Qu'est-ce que c'est que ça ?
languages.original_text: Bridge: Lord Captain's orders — prepare for manoeuvring. Shields to max, engines to max, fire on the enemy on my mark only! Wait... What is that?

traits.locale_text: Passerelle : Sur ordre {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, préparez-vous à la manœuvre. Boucliers au maximum, moteurs à plein régime, parés à tirer sur l'ennemi à mon signal ! Attendez... Qu'est-ce que c'est que ça ?

languages.text: Köprü: Lord Kaptan'ın emirleri şu şekilde: Manevraya hazırlanın. Kalkanları azami düzeye çıkarın, motorları azami kapasitede çalıştırın, düşmana ateş etmek için emir bekleyin! Bir saniye... Bu da ne?
languages.original_text: Bridge: Lord Captain's orders — prepare for manoeuvring. Shields to max, engines to max, fire on the enemy on my mark only! Wait... What is that?

traits.locale_text: Köprü: Lord Kaptan'ın emirleri şu şekilde: Manevraya hazırlanın. Kalkanları azami düzeye çıkarın, motorları azami kapasitede çalıştırın, düşmana ateş etmek için emir bekleyin! Bir saniye… Bu da ne?
